Typealiases.html#/s:6Parsel1La.name: L
Typealiases.html#/s:6Parsel1La.abstract: L is the shortcut for Lexical namespace

Structs/GenericParseError.html.name: GenericParseError
Structs/GenericParseError.html.abstract: A generic error that occured while parsing

Functions/>~(_:_:).html.abstract: Sequential conjunction of two parsers while ignoring the result of lhs

Functions/<~(_:_:).html.abstract: Sequential conjunction of two parsers while ignoring the result of rhs

Functions/~(_:_:).html.abstract: Sequential conjunction of lhs and rhs with combining of the results in a tuple

Functions/^^^(_:_:).html.abstract: Convenience operator for map operation. Replaces the result of lhs with rhs

Functions/??(_:_:).html.abstract: Convenience operator overload to use fallback on fail.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS6ParselE1rAA.name: r
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS6ParselE1rAA.abstract: Returns a RegexParser with self as the pattern

Enums/Lexical/Error.html.name: Error
Enums/Lexical/Error.html.abstract: Errors that could occur while lexical parsing

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO4c.name: char
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO4c.abstract: Parses one Character from a given String

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO4c.name: char(_:)
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO4c.abstract: Parses a specific Character from a given String

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO6s.name: string(_:)
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO6s.abstract: Parses a given String from a String.

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO6s.name: string(length:)
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO6s.abstract: Parses a string with the given length

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO5d.name: digit
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO5d.abstract: Parses a digit [0-9] from a given String

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO12.name: binaryNumber
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO12.abstract: A parser for numbers of the format 0b10110110

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO11.name: octalNumber
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO11.abstract: A parser for numbers of the format 0o12372106

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO17.name: hexadecimalNumber
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO17.abstract: A parser for numbers of the format 0xdeadbeaf or 0xDEADBEAF

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO6n.name: number
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO6n.abstract: Parses a number in hexadecimal, octal, binary or decimal format

Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO14.name: floatingNumber
Enums/Lexical.html#/s:6Parsel7LexicalO14.abstract: Parses a floating number from String to Double (0.123; 0,123; â€¦)

Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.name: map(f:)
Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.abstract: Transforms the result with f, if successful.

Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.name: flatMap(f:)
Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.abstract: Create a new ParseResult for the result.

Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.name: isSuccess()
Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.abstract: Checks whether or not the result is successful

Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.name: isFailed()
Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.abstract: Checks whether or not the result is failed

Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.name: unwrap()
Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.abstract: Unwraps the result from the success case.

Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.name: unwrap(fallback:)
Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.abstract: Unwraps the wrapped result and uses fallback if .fail(_)

Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.name: rest()
Enums/ParseResult.html#/s:6Parsel11Parse.abstract: Returns the rest of the parsing operation in success case.

Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO21un.name: unwrappedFailedResult
Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO21un.abstract: is thrown when .unwrap() is called on a failed ParseResult

Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO25er.name: errorFromSuccessfulResult
Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO25er.abstract: is thrown when error() is called on a succeeded ParseResult

Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO28co.name: conjunctionOfEmptyCollection
Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO28co.abstract: is returned when Parser.or is called on an empty collection of parsers

Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO19ex.name: expectedAtLeastOnce
Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO19ex.abstract: is returned when atLeastOnce failed because the parser succeeded not at all

Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO15ex.name: expectedAtLeast
Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO15ex.abstract: is returned when atLeast(count:) failed because the parser succeeded less than n

Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO15ex.name: expectedExactly
Enums/Errors.html#/s:6Parsel6ErrorsO15ex.abstract: is returned when exactly(count:) failed because the parser succeeded less than or more than n

Enums/Errors.html.name: Errors
Enums/Errors.html.abstract: Generic errors that could occur on Core parsers

Enums/Lexical.html.name: Lexical
Enums/Lexical.html.abstract: Lexical is the namespace for Lexical parsers (you can also use shorthand L if you prefer)

Classes/RegexParser/Error.html#/s:6Parse.name: doesNotMatch
Classes/RegexParser/Error.html#/s:6Parse.abstract: Pattern does not match the input (at the beginning)

Classes/RegexParser/Error.html#/s:6Parse.name: invalidRegex
Classes/RegexParser/Error.html#/s:6Parse.abstract: Regular expression is invalid (could not be evaluated by NSRegularExpression)

Classes/RegexParser.html#/s:6Parsel11Reg.name: init(_:)
Classes/RegexParser.html#/s:6Parsel11Reg.abstract: Initialize a new RegexParser with a regular expression

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC13.name: ParseFunction
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC13.abstract: ParseFunction is the type of the wrapped function type

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC5p.name: parse
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC5p.abstract: The wrapped function, call to start the parsing process.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserCAC.name: init(parse:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserCAC.abstract: Initialize a parser with the given wrapping function.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4j.name: just(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4j.abstract: just creates a parser that parses the given value as success

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4f.name: fail(error:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4f.abstract: fail creates a parser that fails with the given error.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4f.name: fail(message:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4f.abstract: Creates a parser that always fails with a GenericParseError.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC7f.name: flatMap(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC7f.abstract: Produce a new parser for every succeeded parsing process.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC3m.name: map(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC3m.abstract: Produce a new parser which calls f on each successful parsing operation.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC6f.name: filter(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC6f.abstract: Filter the result of the parser. Could be used for validation.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4t.name: then(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC4t.abstract: Discards the result of self and executes other afterwards on the rest.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC8o.name: optional
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC8o.abstract: Tries to parse self and consumes it if success.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC2o.name: or(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC2o.abstract: Concatenates the results of self + all given parsers.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC2o.name: or(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC2o.abstract: Concatenates the results of given parsers with an or operation.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC8f.name: fallback(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC8f.abstract: Provides a fallback if the parser fails.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC8f.name: fallback(_:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC8f.abstract: Provides a fallback parser that is being used if self.parse fails.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC11.name: atLeastOnce
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC11.abstract: Parses self repetitive with at least one success

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC11.name: atLeastOnce(sep:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC11.abstract: Parses self repetitive with separator with at least one success

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC7a.name: atLeast(count:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC7a.abstract: Parses self repetitive with at least count succeeds.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC7e.name: exactly(count:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC7e.abstract: Parses self exactly count times and return the results in an array

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC3r.name: rep
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC3r.abstract: Parses self repetitive and returns results in array

Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC3r.name: rep(sep:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:6Parsel6ParserC3r.abstract: Parses self repetitive separated by sep Parser.

Classes/Parser.html.name: Parser
Classes/Parser.html.abstract: A Parser parses sequences of T (Token) to one or multiple R (Result)

Classes/RegexParser.html.name: RegexParser
Classes/RegexParser.html.abstract: A parser that parses Strings with a given regular expression
